description: This file defines a React functional component named MessageBubble used for rendering chat message bubbles with different roles (assistant, user, system). It includes styling, conditional rendering for avatars and metadata, and animation classes. The component supports customization of appearance based on role and message state.

methods.name: MessageBubble
methods.description: React functional component that renders a stylized chat message bubble with role-based styling, optional avatar, timestamp, name, and animated entrance.
